knowmine_app module¶

The knowmine module¶

The ” knowmine app”extracts potentially relevant sentences from the collection of scientific articles. Currently a User should provide a path to the collection of texts in pdf format and list of keywords for the extraction.

knowmine_app.extract_relevant_sentences(folder_path, main_terms, relation_words, outputfile_format='db')¶
knowmine_app.get_sentences(file)¶

knowmine_app.FilesReader module¶

Function accessing the files in a User provided folder and returning the list of file names

knowmine_app.FilesReader.get_file_names(folder)¶

knowmine_app.TextExtractor module¶

This module contains the TextExtraction class, which allows to extract and clean text from pdf articles

class knowmine_app.TextExtractor.TextExtraction(filepath)¶

Bases: object

getText()¶

Class method extracting texts of articles

knowmine_app.AllSentencesExtractor module¶

The module contains SentencesExtraction class which provides functionality to extract sentences from the given articles

class knowmine_app.AllSentencesExtractor.SentencesExtraction(filetext)¶

Bases: object

This class provides methods for recognizing single sentences of a given text

Attributes:

filetext: Pre cleaned text of an article sentences: full_sent:

get_sentences()¶

Class method extracting all the sentences of article texts

knowmine_app.KeywordsExtractor module¶

The knowmine_app.KeywordsExtractor module provides functionality to extract five keywords of the sentences. Applies a pke module: https://boudinfl.github.io/pke/build/html/index.html

knowmine_app.KeywordsExtractor.ExtractKeywords(sentences)¶

knowmine_app.RelevantSentencesExtractor module¶

This module contains a RelevantSentences class, which, from all the articles sentences, extracts only the ones containing the provided main terms

class knowmine_app.RelevantSentencesExtractor.RelevantSentences(file_name, main_terms, relation_words)¶

Bases: object

get_relevant_sentences()¶

Class method extracting relevant sentences of all the sentences of the texts

knowmine_app.OutputfileGenerator module¶

This module contains the Output class which helps to generate the output file of the desired format (sqlite database or excel) containing the extracted sentences, number of sentences in the original text (after the cleaning) and number of the extracted sentences The result file is generated in the folder containing the articles for mining.

class knowmine_app.OutputfileGenerator.Output(folder, output)¶

Bases: object

add_result_to_database()¶
add_result_to_excel()¶
